name: Roll The Dice (DarkFluo)
description:
Roll the dice to get points, Roll the upgrade dices to upgrade your main dices and buy upgrades in the shop for the upgrade dices.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Sadly, I didn't have time to finish, due to a terrible organisation... It's probably full of bugs and it has no sounds, no  custom buttons,  a rushed menu and tutorial...

If the game is confusing, I'm sorry, I didn't have the time for playtesting nor for a proper tutorial.

This year, I didn't have as much fun making a game as I did last year, but I learned a lot, and that's good
